entries.meaning: A preliminary model or sketch used in preparation for making a sculpture.
examples: And I thought, if I can imagine this place in real life, I can build it in the studio and then paint from the maquette as if it were a real landscape. In terms of process this was a breakthrough for me [â€¦]

verbs.description: maquette (third-person singular simple present maquettes, present participle maquetting, simple past and past participle maquetted)

entries.meaning: (art, transitive, intransitive, rare) To prepare a maquette (of).
